Author: John Chrysostom, Saint, -407|~|Ephrem the Syrian, Saint, 303-373|~|Gregory, of Nazianzus, Saint|~|Basil, Saint, Bishop of Caesarea, approximately 329-379|~|John, Climacus, Saint, active 6th century
Contents note: Miscellaneous Mimars, Apophthegmata ; Sermons ; Commentaries and Theological Discourses, some of which are anonymous, and others by SS. John Chrysostom, Moses of Scetis, Ephraem the Syrian, Gregory the Theologian Bishop of Nazienz, Basil the Great and John Climax ; Troparia of Easter ; Life of St. Nicolaus of Myra ; Martyrdom of St. Barbara ; Encomi­um to Our Lady

Condition note: Ff. 246, 249, and 254 lacking.
